user_query: [Applause] [Music] Naomi hi Naomi nice to meet you Naomi nice to meet you nice to meet you got an awesome place here I don't think I've ever been in a house this big before oh really yeah beautiful beach out there everything ever feel this forever for 3 weeks we sailed the Naomi through the Caribbean eventually taking her home to Long Island where we bought a house 7 acres on the Gold Coast of Long Island the most expensive real estate in the world with maids cooks landscapers you name it we even had two guards who worked in shifts both named Rocco hey welcome Steve here yet the day that we launched the Steve Madden IPO show show them the shoe okay yeah anyway you know just this shoe this pretty cool this is the Mary Lou which is really the shoe that put me on the map without it I wouldn't be oh all right let's give it up for Steve Madden and his awesome Mary Lou hold that up hold that up hold that up proud give him a round of applause I want you to go out there and I want you to ram Steve Madden's stock down your client's throats till they choke on it till they choke on it and they buy a 100,000 shares that's what I want now let's knock this motherfucker out of the park yeah the FBI they want a copy of your wedding video his name is Denham he's an agent with the New York office what's his problem he's a boy scout think you're Gekko what does wrong with my wedding video it's like an invasion of my privacy you know what I'm saying it's like it's intrusive you know got

entities.entity_description: Naomi는 주인공이 만나는 여성 캐릭터로, 그녀의 이름을 딴 요트를 타고 카리브해를 항해하며 롱아일랜드에 집을 구입한다
Steve Madden은 신발 디자이너로, Mary Lou라는 신발로 유명해진 인물이며 IPO를 진행하는 캐릭터이다
Rocco는 주인공 집에서 교대로 일하는 경비원들의 이름이다
Denham은 뉴욕 지부 소속 FBI 요원으로, 주인공의 결혼식 비디오 사본을 요청하는 인물이다
Gekko는 Denham이 주인공을 비유할 때 언급하는 인물이다
Mary Lou는 Steve Madden을 유명하게 만든 신발의 이름이다

relationships.relationship_description: Naomi와 Steve Madden은 같은 영화에 등장하는 캐릭터들이다
Denham은 Naomi의 결혼식 비디오를 요청하는 FBI 요원이다
Steve Madden은 Mary Lou 신발을 만든 디자이너이다
